privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: How we collect, use, and protect your data

content.intro: Welcome to Plugged.in ("we," "our," or "us"). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our service. Please read this privacy policy carefully.
content.disclaimer: If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the service.
content.note: IMPORTANT NOTE: Plugged.in is currently in Release Candidate status. This privacy policy may be updated as the service matures and additional features are implemented.
content.thirdParty: We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third-party sites or services.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy applies to Plugged.in, the AI crossroads platform operated by VeriTeknik B.V. This policy describes how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other applicable data protection laws.

controller.title: 2. Data Controller
controller.intro: The data controller responsible for your personal data is:
controller.addressDetails: Prinses Margrietplantsoen 33, 2595 AM Den Haag, Netherlands

dataCollection.title: 3. Data We Collect
dataCollection.intro: We collect the following categories of personal data:

usage.title: Usage Data
usage.servers: MCP servers and configurations (encrypted - see Security section)

technical.title: Technical Data
technical.analytics: Analytics data (if Google Analytics is enabled)
technical.localStorage: Local storage for preferences (theme, language, font)

legalBasis.title: 4. Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.intro: We process your personal data based on the following legal grounds:

contract.title: Performance of Contract:
contract.desc: To provide you with our services and fulfill our contractual obligations

legitimate.title: Legitimate Interests:
legitimate.desc: For security, fraud prevention, and service improvement

consent.title: Consent:
consent.desc: For marketing communications and analytics (where applicable)

legal.title: Legal Obligations:
legal.desc: To comply with applicable laws and regulations

dataUse.title: 5. How We Use Your Data
dataUse.intro: We use your personal data for the following purposes:
dataUse.service: To provide and maintain our service
dataUse.communication: To communicate with you about your account and service updates
dataUse.security: To ensure the security and integrity of our platform
dataUse.improvement: To improve and develop new features

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.intro: Under the GDPR, you have the following rights:

access.title: Right to Access:
access.desc: You have the right to request copies of your personal data

rectification.title: Right to Rectification:
rectification.desc: You have the right to request correction of inaccurate personal data

erasure.title: Right to Erasure:
erasure.desc: You have the right to request deletion of your personal data

portability.title: Right to Data Portability:
portability.desc: You have the right to request transfer of your data to another service

object.title: Right to Object:
object.desc: You have the right to object to processing of your personal data

restriction.title: Right to Restriction:
restriction.desc: You have the right to request restriction of processing

withdraw.title: Right to Withdraw Consent:
withdraw.desc: Where processing is based on consent, you can withdraw it at any time

complaint.title: Right to Complaint:
complaint.desc: You have the right to lodge a complaint with the Dutch Data Protection Authority (Autoriteit Persoonsgegevens)

rights.exercise: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at privacy@plugged.in

sharing.title: 7. Data Sharing
sharing.intro: We may share your data with:

providers.title: Service Providers:
providers.desc: Third-party services that help us operate our platform (hosting, email)

legal.title: Legal Requirements:
legal.desc: When required by law or to protect our rights

consent.title: With Your Consent:
consent.desc: When you explicitly agree to share your data

thirdParty.title: 8. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.intro: We use the following third-party services:

auth.title: Authentication Providers:
auth.desc: GitHub, Google, Twitter for OAuth authentication

retention.title: 9. Data Retention
retention.intro: We retain your data as follows:

account.title: Account Data:
account.desc: Retained as long as your account is active

logs.title: Activity Logs:
logs.desc: Retained according to configured retention policies

deleted.title: Deleted Accounts:
deleted.desc: Personal data is anonymized or deleted within 30 days of account deletion

international.title: 10. International Data Transfers
international.content: Your data may be transferred to and processed in countries outside the European Economic Area (EEA). When we transfer data outside the EEA, we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place, such as Standard Contractual Clauses or adequacy decisions.

security.title: 11. Security Measures
security.intro: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data, including:
security.encryption: Encryption of passwords and sensitive data

mcpEncryption.title: MCP Server Configuration Encryption:
mcpEncryption.desc: All MCP server configurations, including commands, arguments, environment variables, and URLs, are encrypted using AES-256-GCM encryption with profile-specific keys. This means:
items: Your MCP server configurations are encrypted in our database and cannot be accessed by us, even if we wanted to
Each profile has its own unique encryption key derived from your profile UUID
Only you can decrypt and access your MCP server configurations
Even our database administrators cannot view your MCP server sensitive data

cookies.title: 12. Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.intro: We use the following types of cookies:

essential.title: Essential Cookies:
essential.desc: Required for authentication and core functionality

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies:
analytics.desc: Google Analytics cookies (only when you consent)

cookies.localStorage: We also use browser local storage to save your preferences (theme, language, font settings).

children.title: 13. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our service is not intended for users under the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 16. If you become aware that a child has provided us with personal data, please contact us.

changes.title: 14. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date. We will notify registered users via email for material changes.

contact.title: 15. Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or want to exercise your rights, contact us at:

dpa.title: Dutch DPA:
dpa.desc: You can also contact the Autoriteit Persoonsgegevens at autoriteitpersoonsgegevens.nl

status.question: What is the current status of Plugged.in?
status.answer: Plugged.in is currently in Release Candidate status. This means that while the core functionality is complete, there may still be bugs or issues that need to be addressed before the final release.

bugs.question: How can I report a bug?
bugs.answer: You can report bugs by sending an email to support@plugged.in or by opening an issue on our GitHub repository. Please include detailed steps to reproduce the bug, along with any relevant error messages.

security.question: Is my data secure during the Release Candidate phase?
security.answer: While we implement standard security practices, during the Release Candidate phase, we recommend not storing sensitive information within the service. Please review our Privacy Policy for more information.

content.note: Note: During the Release Candidate phase, our support capabilities may be limited. We will do our best to respond to all inquiries in a timely manner.
